body.name: JBL Wireless Two Microphone System with Dual-Channel Receiver, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 26 mins
features: High vocal quality and JBL Original Pro Sound: The crystal clear clarity from the JBL wireless mics means no jamming, delay or distortion. Your voice will sound on point, with the backing of incredible JBL Original Pro Sound.

Rechargeable UHF dual channel wireless receiver: There’s no need to fly solo, unless you want to take center stage of course. Connect two wireless microphones together and hear both voices blended perfectly through the speaker for up to 6 hours of playtime.
Plug and Play: When you want to be heard, you want to be heard now. The JBL wireless mics have a super simple setup. Just turn on the receiver and wireless microphone and you’re good to go instantly.
Microphones come with replaceable AA batteries: JBL wireless mics come with easy replaceable AA batteries, so get your groove on all night long.
Best performance with JBL PartyBox speakers: Use JBL wireless mics on a speaker with a mic input, but for the best experience, add-on to any of the JBL PartyBox speakers.
body.description: JBL wireless mics deliver JBL Original Pro Sound with incredible vocal clarity and detail. Hit the high notes with no distortion or delay. Just plug the wireless dual-channel receiver into your speaker, turn on the mics, and you’re ready to shine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with Positive Grid Spark Mini Guitar Amp
reviews.reviewText: This product works really well paired with my Positive Grid Spark Mini guitar amp. You have to configure the virtual pedals in order to boost the microphone signal to an instrument level signal. I'm still fine tuning my configuration, but this pedal setup seems to work really well to give a karaoke effect on your vocals.- Booster Drive Pedal: gain 10- Fishboy Amp: gain 10, volume 10- Digital Chorus Pedal: E level 5, tone 5- Vintage Delay Pedal: repeat rate 1/8, intensity 3.0, echo 3.0- Room Studio A Reverb Pedal: level 4.0, time 3.0I bound this custom configuration to my "custom" hardware preset button, so it's really easy to set up. The volume is not as loud as my guitar would be through the amp, but it's definitely loud enough for an apartment or household karaoke setting. Vocals are still super clear after going through two gain stages, I haven't noticed any distortion. The Fishboy virtual amp setting handles vocals really well and gives a natural vocal tone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wireless mics
reviews.reviewText: They always link up. The sound clear. Great value worked great with JBL party speaker.

reviews.reviewText: Omg this microphones are amazingly great. The quality of your voice as it travels through the microphone is insane. My family and I ha e so much fun on our karaoke nights. This has been my greatest investment for hubby and the house. Yeiiiii

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Trusted company in sound.
reviews.reviewText: Pro musician. Just spend the extra money for JBL. Sounds better. Built better. These mics sound excellent on my party 300

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These mics are not professional by all means but they work well enough to do speeches or karaoke. I am a dj and use these all the time. The con is they do give a buzz when volune is high on all the mixers i have tried, including my ddj s1 controller. The reciever turns off after a while on its own and I am guessing it is to save bettery power. The mics, once turned on, take a second or two to connect to the reciever and pass sound through. Other than that they sound clear and give a more professional look. Def good back up mics or karaoke mics. Great for mobile djs. Rechargeable batteries work on these. Not heavy so most likely delicate on accidental drops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars To buy a cage to protec it.
reviews.reviewText: Please it would be nice to include a cage to protect and carry on the microphone. I had to buy a case from another branch. Nice sound and Zise. Easy to use. I Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mic - poor button placement
reviews.reviewText: I like the sound quality, but the power button is easy to touch when belting out lyrics stoping the show… I’ll probably look for a different brand for this reason and keep these as backup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these microphones together with the JBL 150 speaker for my karaoke and they are of great value and quality.

Me encantaron, funcionan a la perfección; los conecté a una bocina LG Xboom, para armar el karaoke en una fiesta, y definitivamente superaron mis expectativas. Sólo es cosa de configurar correctamente las funciones de karaoke y listo. Si se usa para dar conferencias también tiene un gran nivel de nitidez en la voz. Había comprado en otra plataforma pero se atrasaron en el envío, así que preferí comprar en Amazon para que llegaran en la fecha que los necesitaba.
Love JBL..great cordless mics for use at functions and karaoke 🥳
Funcionan muy bien, muy buen sonido, es un placer cantar en karaoke con estos micrófonos, los disfruto mucho en familia y con amigos.

I was excited on this JBL mic to go perfectly with my JBL1000 when I'm hosting events, the sound quality is really good!However, unfortunately it let me down right from the first use.1. The power button on the mic is too sensitive, it turns off/on on a slight touch which is a disadvantage especially that they made the switch button too low so there's very minimal space to hold the mic below the button.2. Once turned off, it automatically changes to a different channel which in turn disrupts the connection to the receiver (maybe?)3. The advertized distance to the receiver is >10m range but im just 5m away with no interference of some kind from where im standing up to the mic receiver but it is already dropping outI wish I could return but the box was totally torn apart and thrown away. In general, this is a good mic just not to be used on highly active environment like hosting, karaoke, games or similar activities
